title: Show total acceptance criteria count across entire PRD
description: When Ralph starts, it should show the total number of acceptance criteria across ALL stories in the PRD (e.g., '27 stories, 156 total criteria'). This helps users understand the full scope of work.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find where Ralph displays PRD summary at startup
Loop through all story files and sum acceptanceCriteria lengths
Calculate: total_criteria = sum of all .acceptanceCriteria | length
Calculate: checked_criteria = sum of all checked=true across all stories
Display format at startup: 'PRD: X stories, Y/Z criteria checked'
Test: Run Ralph, verify total criteria count shown at start
